entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 12:57 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:57 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 12:57 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023
